services.consultationCta: Not sure which service fits your needs?

about.title: Bridging Worlds Through Technology
about.description1: Founded by a former freelance backend developer, Casablanca Technology understands the unique challenges of building software that works across cultures and continents.
about.description2: Based in the heart of Tokyo, we combine Japan's attention to detail and quality with global technical expertise. Our team speaks the language of both business and technology, ensuring seamless communication throughout your project.
about.description3: Whether you need a new system built from scratch or want to enhance your existing team, we deliver solutions that respect your business culture while pushing technological boundaries.

contact.title: Let's Build Together
contact.subtitle: Ready to start your project? We'd love to hear from you.
